data.title: PlayStation Studios
data.meta_description: PlayStation Studios, formerly SCE Worldwide Studios, was established in September 2005 as a global brand name for different development studios owned by Sony Interactive Entertainment, led by Phil Harrison. These include (as of January 2024): ASOBI...
data.text: Marvel Spider-Man 2 (2023 on PlayStation 5) The Last of Us: Part II (2020 on PlayStation 4, PlayStation Now) Dreams (2020 on PlayStation 4) Death Stranding (2019 on Windows, PlayStation 4) Erica (2019 on Windows, iPhone, iPad...) Frantics (2018 on PlayStation 4) Shadow of the Colossus (2018 on PlayStation 4) Shadow of the Colossus (Digital Deluxe) (2018 on PlayStation 4) The Last Guardian VR (Demo) (2017 on PlayStation 4) Horizon: Zero Dawn - Complete Edition (2017 on Windows, PlayStation 4) Knowledge is Power (2017 on PlayStation 4) That's You! (2017 on PlayStation 4) Horizon: Zero Dawn (2017 on PlayStation 4) LittleBigPlanet 2: Toy Story 1 Costume Pack (2014 on PlayStation 3) LittleBigPlanet 2: Toy Story 2 Costume Pack (2014 on PlayStation 3) LittleBigPlanet 2: Toy Story 3 Costume Pack (2014 on PlayStation 3) The Last of Us: Remastered (2014 on PlayStation 4) The Unfinished Swan (2012 on Windows, PlayStation 3, PS Vita...) inFAMOUS + inFAMOUS 2 (2012 on PlayStation 3)
